overview: In (Un)Lucky in Love, the beautifully talented Tayte Hanson stars as Lucky Jones, the unluckiest guy when it comes to the matters of love. Flouting "app convention," Lucky joins a video dating service and starts recounting his hilarious escapades during his interview - like how he "mistakenly" slept with porn star Austin Wolf while planning to hook up with someone else, or got double booked for sex. Will the stars ever align for Mr. Jones? (Un)Lucky in Love also features award-winners Angel Rivera, Roman Todd, and Brock Banks in a beautiful, head-turning performance.
title: (Un)Lucky in Love
